rooms.name: Entrance and Living Area
rooms.description: A minimalist living area serving as the entrance, incorporating an open-plan design with seamless integration into the kitchen. Large window openings ensure ample natural light and adhere to Vastu principles by keeping a clear line of sight.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: An integrated minimalist kitchen adjoining the living area, designed with functional yet sleek cabinetry, optimized for workflow as per Vastu guidelines emphasizing cleanliness and open spaces.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: A dedicated workspace designed to enhance productivity. The room is positioned in the northeast corner as per Vastu principles, ensuring a productive environment with natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A functional and minimalist bathroom integrated within the ground floor for convenience. Placed to ensure privacy while aligning with Vastu requirements for hygiene and energy flow.

openings.description: Large windows across living area and home office, ensuring natural light and ventilation, following both minimalist design and Vastu guidelines.
Open-plan layout with sliding doors connecting living area to garden for indoor-outdoor continuity.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A minimalist master bedroom located on the upper floor, ensuring privacy and tranquility. Positioned in the southwest zone as per Vastu for relaxation.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated home theater space designed with acoustics in mind. Located away from high-traffic areas to provide an immersive viewing experience and minimal distractions.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: An additional minimalist guest bedroom, positioned to ensure ample ventilation and natural lighting, in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: Balconies integrated into the bedrooms for better air circulation and an unobstructed view of the garden.
A modern split-level staircase connecting ground floor to upper floor, ensuring a seamless transition between spaces while adhering to safety norms.

garden.description: An expansive garden area designed around the farmhouse that complements the minimalist aesthetic and provides outdoor space for relaxation. It includes native landscaping with water features in accordance with Vastu principles.

vastu_considerations.detail: The entrance is positioned to ensure a direct view of the garden, promoting positive energy and tranquility.
Work areas like the home office are strategically placed in the northeast, while leisure spaces such as the home theater and bedroom areas are oriented in the southwest for restful energy.
Large windows ensure ample natural light throughout, with a focus on eastern exposures to promote health and productivity.
